page.title: 02A day in the life of James
page.content: A Day in the Life of James On Sunday I got up at 8.42 a.m. and went downstairs. I read the mail on Sunday, which includes a magazine and comic. I had breakfast which consisted of a bowl of cornflakes. About 9.30 a.m. I played in the garden with my hacky sack. This is a small leather ball, with plastic pellets inside to stop it bouncing. I went straberry picking with my mum at 11.30 a.m.for an hour near the Dog and Partridge at Orsett. We had dinner at 1.00 p.m. We had pork, roast potatoes, yorkshire puddings, peas and greens. In the afternoon I watched the British Grandprix from Silverstone on the television. I played with my brother after that. At 7.08 p.m. I had some cheese and crackers. In the evening I watched television with my dad. I went to bed at 10.15 p.m.
